This is a proposal on the services named, subject to the conditions noted below: This proposal is a lump-sum job cost binding said provider to perform aforementioned services upon receiving

100% upon completion. If compliance standards are not met and additional consultation and/or site visits are required, those services will be charged separately. Proposal not applicable to

prevailing wage / certified payroll projects. If these items are required a new proposal will need to be provided to reflect those changes. Contracted person(s) may terminate this contract at any

time but will be subject to pay the contract price plus a fee of 20% and any payments outstanding for additional services rendered. Late payments to accrue at 5% per month. To accept this
